product.name: Modern Bathroom Vanity Light 5 Light Farmhouse Vanity Lighting Over Mirror Brushed Nickel Sconces Wall Lighting with Clear Glass Shade Farmhouse Bath Lighting for Bathroom Dressing
product.bullet_points:
• Unique Design :Made of its elegant rustic black metal finish, a cool rectangular base design and high end 4 side clear glass shades of the 2-light wall sconces, which is like 2 shinny gems gleaming in your house, To install this black vanity light can be exquisite home decor to bright up your house and your life.
• Wide Applications : Clear and Transparent glass lamp shade brings more brilliance to your bathroom .This black bathroom vanity light highly suits for any decoration style, such as industrial, modern, retro, farmhouse, traditional, country etc. This mirror vanity light fixture is not only used in daily lighting in the bathroom, bedroom, living room, hallway and foyer, but also is act as an art décor in business activities like exhibitions, galleries, restaurants, cafes and etc.
• Dimmable and E26 Standard Socket Base :Fully dimmable when used with a dimmable bulb and compatible dimmer switch. Suitable For LED,Incandescent,Energy Saving Bulb. You can match different style bulbs to decorate the wall lighting fixture according to different areas.This Vanity Lights NOT include the bulb and Dimmer Switch Not Included.
• Practical Design: This vanity lights for bathroom can well meet your different needs of upwards or downwards for decoration or other practical reading and make-up lighting.
• Easy Installation & Nice After-sale Service: Comes with all mounting hardware accessions and instructions for a quick and easy installation.Note: Need assemble and hardwired. Please cut off the electricity supply before installation. If you have any questions or the glass is broken, please feel free to contact us, we will reply you within 24-hours.
